dcterms:description: A dataset containing clinical notes curated from the United States Department of Veterans Affairs Corporate Data Warehouse (VA CDW), focusing on substance use disorder (SUD) diagnoses and severity information.
dcterms:title: Clinical Notes from the United States Department of Veterans Affairs Corporate Data Warehouse (VA CDW)

dcterms:creator: World Health Organization
dcterms:description: The ICD-10 classification provides clinical descriptions and diagnostic guidelines for mental and behavioral disorders, including substance use disorders.
dcterms:title: ICD-10 Codes

dcterms:creator: American Psychiatric Association
dcterms:description: The DSM-5 provides standardized criteria for the classification of mental disorders, including substance use disorders.
dcterms:title: DSM-5

dcterms:creator: Poulsen MN
Freda PJ
Troiani V
Davoudi A
Mowery DL
dcterms:description: A study that classifies characteristics of opioid use disorder from hospital discharge summaries using natural language processing.
dcterms:title: Various studies on substance use disorder (SUD) extraction
